body_html:
Thank you for your answer, I could indeed have made up one myself !
Nevertheless, since the TestCase class exists, I think it would be nice to be able to import it : no need to c/c it between projects. And the TestCase class handles other datatypes such as sparse tensor. Lastly by documenting it, it could help promote software quality and unit testing among the scientific community which would be not bad. But I may be nitpicking
So thank you again for your answer and you can close my issue if I could not convince you : )

body:
Thank you for your answer, I could indeed have made up one myself ! 
Nevertheless, since the TestCase class exists, I think it would be nice to be able to import it : no need to c/c it between projects. And the TestCase class handles other datatypes such as sparse tensor. Lastly by documenting it, it could help promote software quality and unit testing among the scientific community which would be not bad. But I may be nitpicking
So thank you again for your answer and you can close my issue if I could not convince you : )
